title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A –
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A – 
Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-19) (Face Coverings in Certain Premises and 
Businesses) (Amendment) Regulations 2020.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited health act 1947 (section 31a - temporary restrictions) (covid-19) (face covering certain premise businesses) (amendment) regulation 2020

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: 2. Regulation 2 of the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A – Temporary
text_raw:
2. Regulation 2 of the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A – Temporary 
Restrictions) (Covid-19) (Face Coverings in Certain Premises and Businesses) 
Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 296 of 2020) is amended by the substitution of “the 
9th day of November 2020” for “the 5th day of October 2020”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

3 October, 2020. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 6th October, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [404] 3

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations extend the operation of the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A – 
Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-19) (Face Coverings in Certain Premises and 
Businesses) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 296 of 2020) until 09 November 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [404]
